venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Jesse Friedman (@professor) will be giving a talk on WordPress as a Career and as part of a celebration, we will also have a party for his book release: Web Designer's Guide to WordPress

This meetup will start at 6pm as we will have food, drinks (alcoholic and non at the cash bar) with lots of opportunity for networking.  You can also meet our new organizers as we will announce them at this meetup.

Jesse is also holding a raffle for charity.  If you are interested, please visit http://launch.wdgwp.com/ as there will be plenty to give away!

6-7 Drinks, Food, Networking, Mingling and Raffle Coordination

7-7:15 Announcements

7:15-7:45 "WordPress as a Career"

7:45 - 8:30 Raffle

8:30-9 Mingling and more networking

 

There is a maximum RSVP limit so please update if you can or can not make it!
item.name: BWPM Nov2012: WordPress as a Career and Book Launch Party
